episodes.title: The Candace Owens Show: Zuby
episodes.description:
What happens when a man who identifies as a woman participates in women’s sports and smashes the competition? British hip-hop artist Zuby says he broke the women’s deadlifting record simply to prove there are biological differences between men and women. He joins Candace Owens in her London studio to discuss this experiment and much more. Don’t miss it!
